select trc.contract_code, trc.contract_name, case trc.rent_mode when 0 then '整租' when 1 then '单间' end rent_mode, tpp.project_name, trc.start_date, trc.expired_date, trc.rental, concat('付',ifnull(trc.ren_months,0),'押',ifnull(trc.deposit_months,0)) as pay_type, tb.building_name, th.house_no, tr.room_no, su.name server_name,
ttl.cell_phone as cell_phone_lead, ttl.tenant_name as tenant_name_lead,
tt.cell_phone, tt.tenant_name, '' as pre_pay_date, '' as free_day
from t_rent_contract trc left join t_building tb on trc.building_id = tb.id and tb.del_flag=0 left join t_house th on trc.house_id = th.id and th.del_flag=0 left join t_room tr on trc.room_id = tr.id and tr.del_flag=0 left join sys_user su on th.service_user = su.id and su.del_flag=0 left join t_property_project tpp on tpp.id = trc.property_project_id and tpp.del_flag=0
left join t_contract_tenant tct on tct.contract_id = trc.id and tct.del_flag =0 left join t_tenant tt on tct.tenant_id = tt.id and tt.del_flag=0
left join t_contract_tenant tctl on tctl.lease_contract_id = trc.id and tctl.del_flag =0 left join t_tenant ttl on tctl.tenant_id = ttl.id and ttl.del_flag=0
where trc.del_flag =0
${whereSqlString}
${orderBySqlString}

SELECT DATEDIFF(MAX(tpt.`EXPIRED_DATE`), NOW()),
tpt.`TRANS_ID`, MAX(tpt.`EXPIRED_DATE`) , trc.CONTRACT_CODE,trc.START_DATE,trc.EXPIRED_DATE FROM t_payment_trans tpt
left join t_rent_contract trc on trc.ID = tpt.TRANS_ID WHERE tpt.`DEL_FLAG` = '0' AND tpt.`PAYMENT_TYPE` = '6'
AND tpt.`TRANS_STATUS` = '2' AND tpt.`TRADE_DIRECTION` = '1'
GROUP BY tpt.`TRANS_ID` HAVING DATEDIFF(MAX(tpt.`EXPIRED_DATE`), NOW()) between 3 and 15
